channel.title: Projects on Akash Sivakumar
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Akash Sivakumar

item.title: Movie Recommendation System
item.description: An End-to-end fully functional Movie recommendation system for OTT streaming platforms, using techniques of Collaborative filtering.

item.title: Customer segmentation with RFM Score
item.description: This project was aimed to segment customers into different classes based on their Recency, Frequency and Monetory scores.

item.title: Descriptive Analytics Demystified: Unveiling Statistical Patterns!
item.description: This project showcases the case study done to unveil the statistical aspects of the dataset using Python libraries and Statistics.

item.title: Navigating the Netflix Data Universe
item.description: The objective was to analyze the data and generate insights that could help Netflix in deciding which type of shows/movies to produce and how they can grow the business in different countries!

item.title: Bullseye Insights: Analyzing Retail market's Data with SQL
item.description: Solved this case study which primarily focused on deriving valuable insights from a Leading Retail Market’s data and provide recommendations/ feedback to improve the business.

item.title: TDM Based Wireless Overhead Tank Monitor
item.description: Developed a hardware system by employing the Time Domain Multiplexing concept into the 433 MHz transceiver module, which is used as the wireless system to monitor the inflow of water in the overhead water tanks.
